fields.name: Bot Support
fields.value:
1️⃣ Configuration
2️⃣ Support Tickets
3️⃣ Support Threads
4️⃣ Reaction Roles

fields.name: Commands
fields.value:
• **reactionroles add <messageID> <emote> <roleID>** - Adds a reaction to the specified message that adds/removes the specified role from the user.

 • **reactionroles remove <messageID> <emote>** - Removes the specified reaction from the specified message.
